name: Say Goodbye Grandma!
description:
The old grandma is suffering from Alzheimers, therefore she tends to behave young and childish. She wants to escape the nursing home, to get back home and recover her memories.

The challenge of the game is the illness and the nurses keeping the grandma from escaping or limit her to do what she wants.

Credits:

Programming:

Valentin Mihalache

Niels Frederiksen

Lucas Alexander Nielsen

Graphics:

Corinne Cadalin

Music and Sounds

Nordic Game Jam 2015
